channel.title: Israel National Radio - Eyshet Chayil
channel.description: Malkah Fleisher discusses Jewish life from a woman's point of view in the insightful and inspiring Eyshet Chayil - Woman of Valor podcast. Holidays, Jewish life-cycle events and spirituality are all featured. Topics include, health, pregnancy, self-help and more. The Eyshet Chayil Podcast airs every Tuesday from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. Israel time on Israel National Radio.

image.title: Israel National Radio - Eyshet Chayil
image.description: A neo-Zionist perspective on Israel and the Jewish World.
